name: Operation: Operator
description:
NOTE: Operation: Operator is a VR game that requires an HTC Vive to play.

Thiefbots <3 gold. You are in a security control room in a bank. Can you delay the bots from reaching the vaults long enough for the police arrive?

Use an experimental plug system to view different security camera feeds and lock doors to prevent the bots from getting to the precious gold.

Operation: Operator is a very rough VR prototype. There is no audio. It is provided as-is and may contain bugs. :)

Owen & Matt
